A message from Interim Superintendent Taggerty: Tomorrow at the Board of Education meeting the administrative team and I will review all 3 models that make up our Return to School Plan. After reviewing each model within the plan, we will make a recommendation for our return to school. The facts that influence our recommendation are as follows:

Safety for all
Quality of Instruction
Health Screening
Social Distancing Requirements
Staffing
Transportation
Building Capacity

A reminder that physical capacity for the meeting is limited to 50 total individuals. We will be live-streaming the meeting as well for those who cannot attend in person. The link to live stream will be available Tuesday on our website: https://www.fredonia.wnyric.org/domain/17

Please contact District Clerk Christine Slagle with any questions or concerns: 679-1581 x2701 or cslagle@fcsd.wnyric.org.
